main event: A witness in Casper, Wyoming reported seeing an unidentified flying object (UFO) on August 8, 1962.
interesting points: The object appeared to be hovering at an estimated altitude of 2,000 to 3,000 feet and had an estimated size of 25 to 30 feet in diameter.
The object made a series of abrupt turns and changes in altitude, hovering at times and accelerating swiftly at other times.
The object was described as a bright light, changing colors from white to red to orange, and left no exhaust or trail.
No sounds were heard during the observation, and the weather was clear with a 75% full moon.
The report was investigated by the U.S. Air Force as part of Project Blue Book, but the matter remained unresolved.
sighted object: a bright, hovering object that changed colors and made abrupt maneuvers
